author: 80raghavendra
content: @s1na do you include aux_data in your chunks?

author: s1na
content: <@!689635476826619924> not for the jumpdest-based approach, but for the fixed-size i prepend 1 byte to keep track of the first non-pushdata offset in the chunk

author: _drinkcoffee
content:
> <@!689635476826619924> not for the jumpdest-based approach, but for the fixed-size i prepend 1 byte to keep track of the first non-pushdata offset in the chunk
<@!259648573401071617> Does that mean you would store the whole contract separately, so the aux_data can be accessed?
